title: .Gov Domains
description: This datasets in the subdirectory `dotgov-domains/ `offers the list of all .gov domains, including state, local, and tribal .gov domains. It does not include .mil domains, or other federal domains outside of .gov and .fed.us.
structure: CSV file with fields 'Domain Name', 'Domain Type', 'Agency', 'City', 'State'
comments: There are 2 CSV files in `dotgov-domains/`, one for Federal and one for all of U.S.
